summary: A virtual-machine that can ingest and manage email with a focus on graph-based metrics.

ai_summary.text: A graph-based metrics virtual-machine ingests and manages email, building a communication graph and computing actionable metrics to automate insights like influence, anomalies, and workflow bottlenecks. This enables teams to monitor email ecosystems and trigger automated responses based on graph signals.
examples: Deploy the graph-based metrics virtual-machine via Terraform, mount /data for message storage, and connect IMAP/SMTP credentials to auto-ingest and normalize emails.
